subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: John Isner of the United States led the fifth set, 4-2, and saved 12 match points, but he ultimately fell to to  Tommy Haas in the French Open.
snippet: John Isner of the United States led the fifth set, 4-2, and saved 12 match points, but he ultimately fell to to  Tommy Haas in the French Open.
